parametersDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.
parametersDescriptions.onChange: Callback invoked when new value is being set.
parametersDescriptions.selectionFollowsFocus:
If `true` the selected tab changes on focus. Otherwise it only
changes on activation.
parametersDescriptions.value:
The value of the currently selected `Tab`.
If you don't want any selected `Tab`, you can set this prop to `false`.
